title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Cosmic winds stir up a spiritual and even physical storm that promotes adventure and growth. Youre driven to seek and secure available prospects for understanding more about yourself and the world as the mysterious Scorpio New Moon enlightens your 9th House of Expansion. You can sense there is so much more than you can see on the surface and you want to grasp it all. However, dont spread yourself too thin since this learning process is a life-long journey. Buddhist teacher Pema Chodron wrote, Patience is the training in abiding with the restlessness of our energy and letting things evolve at their own speed. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
